name: Compression
natural_language_description: 这是 Compression 节点。主要用于: Compress and decompress files

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: decompress
available_options: Compress (值: compress) - Compress files into a zip or gzip archive
Decompress (值: decompress) - Decompress zip or gzip archives

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: To process more than one file, use a comma-separated list of the binary fields names
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field(s) | 作用: To process more than one file, use a comma-separated list of the binary fields names | 提示: The name of the input binary field(s) containing the file(s) to decompress | 默认值: data | (必填项)

outputFormat.name: outputFormat
outputFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Format | 作用: Format of the output | 默认值: zip

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: Name of the output file

binaryPropertyOutput.name: binaryPropertyOutput
binaryPropertyOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data

outputPrefix.name: outputPrefix
outputPrefix.description: Prefix to add to the decompressed files
outputPrefix.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Prefix | 作用: Prefix to add to the decompressed files | 默认值: file_ | (必填项)
